Room.Name: Garden Path
Room.ShortDescription: This is the garden where Granovetter grows fresh vegetables for the kitchen.
Room.LongDescription: The back yard for the inn is to the northeast, as well as a fairly new building where Hagbert, the second son of Granovetter, has established a local blacksmith shop. In the middle of the garden to the west you can see the residence of Gracella, the oldest daughter.
